theFleshweaver:RitualStaff.NAME: Ritual Staff
theFleshweaver:RitualStaff.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Morphs into a different version depending on your highest stat.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Deal damage equal to your theFleshweaver:Vitality to all attacking Enemies.
Deal Damage equal to your Magical Rot to all Enemies. Gain !theFleshweaver:SecondMagic! theFleshweaver:Magical_Rot.

theFleshweaver:RitualOrb.NAME: Ritual Orb
theFleshweaver:RitualOrb.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION:: Gain !B! Block. Gain 1 Stat of your choosing.
